# Comparison with @magnetic/core/button

|             | MDS | CDS  |
| ----------- | --- | ---- |
| as          | ✅  | ✅   |
| kind        | ✅  | ✅\* |
| sentiment   |     | ✅   |
| destructive | ✅  | ✅   |
| size        | ✅  | ✅   |
| block       | ✅  | ✅   |
| icon        | ✅  | ✅   |
| rightIcon   | ✅  | ✅   |
| loading     | ✅  | ✅   |

> 1 - `kind` prop changed to `variant`.

Props passed to components translate to data attributes.

`Button.Group` has been renamed to `CDSButton.Group`.
